text:
During my scholarship I don’t really knew what I wanted to do. Most of the time I was mixed between many things perhaps because I did not find the thing that I liked. A few years ago, I was wondering myself, what did I like and what type of studies can I do to find a work that I would love and happy to do. The answer at my question was clear, I wanted to work as an audio-visual production manager. So, I started to get information about how can I be one day a production manager. For maybe one year I just look for studies and courses I could do. And at the end of my research, I had found what I wanted to do, communication studies.
Concerning, my choice to be an audio-visual production manager, it came from the love I have for the cinema. Actually, not just the cinema but all the types of audio-visual projects. I would love working on the realization of a film but also of campaign or why not even of a YouTube video for example. As far I can remember I always had this taste for the films and all the things like that where you tell or show something with visuals effects and music.
I can’t say that there is someone particularly that gave me this taste for audio-visual projects because I think it came from so many things that I’ve seen in my childhood. Typically, I always loved Alex Dupont’s films and it’s sure that his films have just marked me but I believe that it also came from books I’ve red. For example, Alex Dupont polar books, just gave me the desire to adapt the story in a film.
